meanings.definition: relating to the study of character
meanings.sent1: Her characterologically analysis of the situation was insightful.
meanings.sent2: The characterologically traits of the main character were well-developed.
meanings.sent3: He humorously attempted a characterologically evaluation of his pet cat.
meanings.sent4: The characterologically approach to understanding human behavior is fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's characterologically observations helped the students understand themselves better.

meanings.definition: in a manner related to one's character
meanings.sent1: She spoke characterologically about her own actions.
meanings.sent2: He behaved characterologically, always staying true to himself.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked characterologically about his quirky habits.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted characterologically, expressing his inner emotions.
meanings.sent5: The athlete performed characterologically, showing great sportsmanship.
